/* RcpmnyAfterDao.selectRcpmnyAfterList */
SELECT A.APLYID ,A.STLM_STTS_CD ,A.APLY_STTS_CD ,A.APLCNTID ,A.APLCNT_NM ,A.AMT ,A.DPST_AMT ,A.RFND_DMND_AMT ,A.RFND_AMT ,A.MDFCN_DT ,A.REG_DT ,A1.CD_NM AS APLY_STTS_CD_NM ,A2.CD_NM AS STLM_STTS_CD_NM ,B.RSVTDEID ,C.INSTID ,B.DE ,B.BGNG_DT ,B.END_DT ,E.SPCE_NM ,F.FCLT_NM ,G.ACNT ,G.NM FROM TB_FCL_SPCE_APLY A INNER JOIN ( SELECT CD , CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD WHERE CDGRPID = 160 ) A1 ON (A.APLY_STTS_CD = A1.CD) INNER JOIN ( SELECT CD , CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD WHERE CDGRPID = 161 ) A2 ON (A.STLM_STTS_CD = A2.CD) INNER JOIN TB_FCL_APLY_RSVTDE B ON A.APLYID = B.APLYID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_INST C ON A.INSTID = C.INSTID INNER JOIN TB_FCL_SPCE_RSVTDE D ON B.RSVTDEID = D.RSVTDEID INNER JOIN TB_FCL_SPCE E ON D.SPCEID = E.SPCEID INNER JOIN TB_FCL_FCLT F ON E.FCLTID = F.FCLTID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_USER G ON A.APLCNTID = G.USERID WHERE 1=1 AND APLY_STTS_CD IN(160102)

/* RcpmnyAfterDao.selectRcpmnyAfterInfo */ SELECT A.APLYID ,A.STLM_STTS_CD ,A.APLY_STTS_CD ,A.APLCNTID ,A.APLCNT_NM ,A.APLCNT_MOBLPHON ,A.APLCNT_EML ,A.CNCL_DT ,A.RFND_DMND_DT ,A.DPST_DE ,A.DPST_AMT ,A1.CD_NM AS APLY_STTS_CD_NM ,A2.CD_NM AS STLM_STTS_CD_NM ,B.RSVTDEID ,C.INSTID ,C.INST_NM ,B.DE ,B.BGNG_DT ,B.END_DT ,E.SPCE_NM ,F.FCLT_NM ,F1.CD_NM AS BANK_CD_NM ,F.BACNT_NO ,F.DPSTR_NM ,G.CD_NM AS INST_TYPE_CD_NM ,'예약신청' AS PAY_STTUS ,'입금대기' AS REQST_STTUS ,CASE WHEN IFNULL(I.ROLECD,'U') = 'U' AND H.INSTID IS NOT NULL THEN '기업회원' WHEN IFNULL(I.ROLECD,'U') = 'U' AND H.INSTID IS NULL THEN '개인회원' ELSE '관리자' END AS ROLECDNM ,H.NM ,H.MOBLPHON ,H.EML ,H.ACNT ,J.INST_NM AS USER_INST_NM ,K.CD_NM AS STLM_MTHD_CD_NM FROM TB_FCL_SPCE_APLY A INNER JOIN TB_FCL_APLY_RSVTDE B ON A.APLYID = B.APLYID INNER JOIN ( SELECT CD , CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD WHERE CDGRPID = 160 ) A1 ON (A.APLY_STTS_CD = A1.CD) INNER JOIN ( SELECT CD , CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD WHERE CDGRPID = 161 ) A2 ON (A.STLM_STTS_CD = A2.CD) INNER JOIN TB_CMM_INST C ON A.INSTID = C.INSTID INNER JOIN TB_FCL_SPCE_RSVTDE D ON B.RSVTDEID = D.RSVTDEID INNER JOIN TB_FCL_SPCE E ON D.SPCEID = E.SPCEID INNER JOIN TB_FCL_FCLT F ON E.FCLTID = F.FCLTID INNER JOIN ( SELECT CD , CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD WHERE CDGRPID = 154 ) F1 ON (F.BANK_CD = F1.CD) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_CD G ON C.INST_TYPE_CD = G.CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_USER H ON A.APLCNTID = H.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.USERID ,CASE WHEN INSTR(GROUP_CONCAT(A.ROLEID),'1') > 0 OR INSTR(GROUP_CONCAT(A.ROLEID),'5') > 0 THEN 'A' ELSE 'U' END AS ROLECD FROM TB_CMM_ROLE_USER A ,TB_CMM_ROLE B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ROLEID = B.ROLEID GROUP BY USERID ) I ON(H.USERID = I.USERID) LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CMM_INST J ON H.INSTID = J.INSTID INNER JOIN ( SELECT CD , CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD WHERE CDGRPID = 190 ) K ON (A.STLM_MTHD_CD = K.CD) WHERE 1=1 AND A.APLYID = #{aplyid}

/* RcpmnyAfterDao.selectDsptCheckInfo */ SELECT A.APLYID ,A.STLM_STTS_CD ,A.APLY_STTS_CD ,A.APLCNTID ,A.APLCNT_NM ,A.APLCNT_MOBLPHON ,A.APLCNT_EML ,A.CNCL_DT ,A.RFND_DMND_DT ,A.AMT ,A.DPST_DE ,A.DPST_AMT ,CASE WHEN A.RFND_AMT IS NULL THEN A.DPST_AMT ELSE A.RFND_AMT END AS RFND_AMT ,B.RSVTDEID ,C.INSTID ,C.INST_NM ,B.DE ,B.BGNG_DT ,B.END_DT ,E.SPCE_NM ,F.FCLT_NM ,F.BACNT_NO ,F.DPSTR_NM FROM TB_FCL_SPCE_APLY A INNER JOIN TB_FCL_APLY_RSVTDE B ON A.APLYID = B.APLYID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_INST C ON A.INSTID = C.INSTID INNER JOIN TB_FCL_SPCE_RSVTDE D ON B.RSVTDEID = D.RSVTDEID INNER JOIN TB_FCL_SPCE E ON D.SPCEID = E.SPCEID INNER JOIN TB_FCL_FCLT F ON E.FCLTID = F.FCLTID WHERE 1=1 AND A.APLYID = #{aplyid}
